title: Even Google agrees the old days of office life are done
content:
The great enforced global experiment in working from home is coming to an end, as vaccines, the Omicron variant, and new therapeutic drugs bring the COVID-19 crisis under control. But a voluntary experiment has begun, as organizations navigate the new landscape of hybrid work, combining the best elements of remote work with time in the office. Yes, there is some push for a “return to normal” and getting workers back into offices. description: Google has been long been a fierce opponent of working from home. The company told employees they must return to the office – but only for three days a week.
